name: The Lost Gospel of Judas
description:
The Lost Gospel of Judas 

An irreverent take on the Betrayer's Relationship with the Lord

The story of Judas is told in a series of "loose pages," and it's up to you to explore that story. You're in control of how much or how little will be revealed to you. So, explore The Lost Gospel as you see fit.

Created for a class and uploaded for easy dissemination of game file. 

A PDF  of all the pages is also available for download if you don't wish to go through the game.
